title: Three Storied House close to High Level Road
details:
Architecturally designed three storied house close to 119 bus route and Highlevel road
300 meters to 119 bus route, 400 meters to High level road
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Spacious four bed rooms with two attached bathrooms
One common bathroom
Modern Fitted well equipped pantry
Modern fitted wet kitchen
Large covered utility area in second floor ( for Gym, study room or office room)
Laundry area
Servant room with bathroom
Front and rear small gardens
Two covered parking with roller shutter gate
